title: Science-Integrated Interdisciplinary Education Program for Multidisciplinary Design Innovation

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Strengthening the capacity of science professionals to develop innovative solutions by integrating design thinking.

learning_goals: Learners can comparatively analyze design education approaches across four academic disciplines: science, engineering, business administration, and environmental design
Learners develop two or more design prototypes that solve scientific problems through interdisciplinary collaboration
Learners mediate over 80% of conflicts arising in multidisciplinary team projects using digital tools
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
